content:
As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal family or dietary preferences, nor do I have allergies or restrictions. I exist solely to provide information and assist with tasks, so you don't need to worry about accommodating any specific dietary needs.

However, I can provide you with general guidance on how to accommodate common dietary restrictions and preferences, such as vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, or nut-free options. Just let me know if you have any specific questions or concerns, and I'll do my best to help!

In the context of your holiday cooking, you may want to consider asking your family about their dietary preferences or restrictions beforehand, so you can plan accordingly. This will ensure that everyone has something delicious and safe to enjoy during your gathering.
